quotes.text: There is always one more bug to fix.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.text: There is always one more bug to fix.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.text: If debugging is the process of removing bugs,then programming must be the process of putting them in.
quotes.author: Sam Redwine

quotes.text: There is always one more bug to fix.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: Java is to JavaScript what car is to Carpet.
quotes.author: Chris Heilmann

quotes.text:
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand.
Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.text: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
quotes.author: Ralph Johnson

quotes.text: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: John Wood

quotes.text: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: When I wrote this code, only God and I understood what I did. Now only God knows.
quotes.author: Anonymous
